protocol.text: All raw data from each array were processed by background correction and quantile normalization using CodeLink from the R package (Gautier et al., 2004). In addition, all array data were processed to calculate the robust multi-array average (RMA) (Irizarry et al., 2003) using AFFY (Gautier et al., 2004). Expression values were computed by applying the RMA model of probespecific correction to perfect-match probes. These corrected probe values were then subjected to quantile normalization (Bolstad et al., 2003). The resulting RMA expression values were log2  ransformed. ID_REF =  VALUE = log2 RMA
Arabidopsis seedlings of each genotype were grown in controlled environment of growth chamber. Seedlings were grown for 7 days under continuous red light.
Total RNAs were prepared using Quiagen Rneasy kit
Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 6 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).
Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on GeneChip Arabidopsis (ATH1) GenChip Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 400.
GeneChips were scanned using the Hewlett-Packard GeneArray Scanner G2500A.
